## R package for the exploration and analysis of many genotype-phenotype datasets at once.

## Installation

```{r, eval=FALSE}
if(!"remotes" %in% rownames(install.packages())){install.packages("remotes")}

remotes::install_github("neurogenomics/phenomix")
```
